page.title: 09SCHOOLS 3
page.content:
Barnham Junior school is situated north of the B2233,half a mile from Barnham station.There are 310 pupils aged 5 to 11.There are 15 teachers and 15 ancillary staff.There are 11 classes.Lessons consist of normal lessons except for French,Latin and German.A special facility is the special unit for handicapped children. There are about 10 handicapped children in the school and there is a swimming pool for these children. The school at Barnham is split into two, one is situated in Yapton Road which is just out of our area and the other is quite new,situated in Elm Grove.
By Charlotte Thwaites and Catherine Coulthard.
